Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= female inhabitant of Shulem (= Shunem (שׁוּנֵם)
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= action by which humans focus their eyes on someone or something in order to see it well

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans focus their eyes on someone or something in order to see it well
= female inhabitant of Shulem (= Shunem (שׁוּנֵם)
= action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which humans or plants develop into a state that is pleasing to the eye
= the lower part of the leg beyond the ankle, on which humans or animals stand and with which they walk
= a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= member of the nobility; ≈ associated with authority; expected to be generous, reliable, and just
= state in which an object has a rounded shape
= the upper part of the leg of humans and animals
= object made by an artist; ◄ made out of a precious metal, with or without precious stones; ► worn for personal adornment; ≈ regarded as valuable and beautiful
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= person with skills for a specific craft
= a rounded knotty depression in the center of a person’s belly caused by the detachment of the umbilical cord after birth
= container; ► used for storing blood (דָּם) and/or wine (מֶזֶג)

Node.gloss: to lack|to be lacking|to fail|to dry up
Node.definition: = state in which humans or objects are found less in quantity or entirely absent in a location where they are supposed to be present
= wine (יַיִן) mixed with spices; ≈ possibly a metaphor for sperm
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a young male fallow deer (אַיָּל) ≈ associated with beauty
= two children or young animals born at the same birth

= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= a hard creamy white substance ◄ made from the tusk of elephants ► and often used to make ornaments and other articles; ≈ regarded as valuable

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= relatively large reservoir ◄ dug by human hands ► to collect water; place where many public activities take place

= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד) ► former residence of Sihon (סִיחֹון) king of Amorites (אֱמֹרִי) (who had captured it from Moab (מֹואָב) assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) later occupied by Moab
meaning unsure; possibly: = name of one of the gates of Heshbon (חֶשְׁבֹּון) located near a number of pools
= part of the body projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the two nostrils
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= action by which humans or deities watch attentitvely to monitor people and places
= town; ◄ in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of one of the Aramaean (אֲרָם) kingdoms

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= mountain; ◄ located in north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) overlooking the Mediterranean Sea
= long hair hanging down from one's head; ≈ regarded as beautiful

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= to be held by someone else, either in a prison or in another situation in which one does not have the freedom to act and go at will; ≈ usually regarded as hardship
meaning unsure; possibly: = long locks of hair; ≈ associated with feminine beauty

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which humans or plants develop into a state that is pleasing to the eye

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to be lovely|to be pleasant|to be sweet|to be dear
Node.definition: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= vertical height of an object

Node.gloss: to be like|to be comparable to|to resemble
Node.definition: = process by which the similarity or dissimilarity between two entities is measured

= a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10 20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= group of flowers or fruits positioned on one stem

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10 20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= group of flowers or fruits positioned on one stem

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it
= air that is expelled from the body through mouth or nose

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 10 meters; it has a rounded crown, and bears a round fruit about the size of an orange; in the spring the tree is completely covered with pink flowers, which gradually give way to the green of the leaves as they develop; the fruit can be greenish, yellow, or red. ◄ Malus sylvestris; ► considered both beautiful and refreshing
= action by which humans utter words; ≈ associated with the palate|= action by which humans press their lips on someone else's lips or any other part of that person's body

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= state in which an object has a relativedly flat surface, where people and objects can move without obstacles; ≈ associated with security and propsperity
= process by which a liquid moves from one location to another; ≈ used metaphorically to refer to one's kisses
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with death, sometimes with being inactive
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

Node.gloss: to turn one's attention to|to be enraptured by|to concentrate one's energy on
Node.definition: = action by which someone concentrates their full attention on someone else ► either with the purpose of pleasing that person or of gaining control over him/her
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= action when people or objects stay overnight in a certain place

= collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall|= a shrub that reaches 2 3 meters in height, with opposite leaves and many fragrant white flowers; ► its leaves yield a red juice that people in many countries use for coloring the skin and hair; ≈ associated with fragrance and beauty
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= process by which objects open up ► in order to give access to something located inside or to create a passage
= process by which plants to produce flowers

= a small tree reaching a height of 3 5 m, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; its has a red flower and produces red round fruits with a hard skin and tightly packed pockets of seeds inside; ◄ Punica granatum; ► the seeds can be made into wine; the flower shaped end of the fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple; ≈ associated with love, beauty, and sex

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a feeling of profound affection for another person, often accompanied by sexual desire

= wild perennial plant without stem; with large, fleshy, forked roots; with large oval leaves arranged in a rosette, purple flowers and yellow green fruits; ◄ mandragora officinarum; ► used medicinally as narcotic and purgative; ≈ because its roots resemble the lower part of the human body this plant was generally believed to induce conception; its fragrance was considered sweet
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth
= object of an extraordinary good quality
= state in which an object has been in existence for only a short time ◄ because of having recently been built or produced

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which an object has been in existence for a relatively long time
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= causative action by which humans store valuable objects in a particular location ► in order to keep them in a good condition or to keep them safe
